Waspada, Beredar Surat Palsu Mengatasnamakan Menteri PANRB Soal Penerimaan CPNS
05 Nov 2019, 15:33 by iman


Waspada, Beredar Surat Palsu Mengatasnamakan Menteri PANRB Soal Penerimaan CPNS

KBRN, Jakarta: Menteri Pendayagunaan Aparatur Negara dan Reformasi Birokrasi (PANRB) Tjahjo Kumolo  meminta masyarakat berhati-hati terkait informasi tentang penerimaan calon pegawai negeri sipil (CPNS). Hal itu dikatakan Tjahjo menanggapi surat palsu yang mengatasnamakan dirinya yang beredar di masyarakat. Surat tersebut bernomor B/887/M.SM.10/2019 perihal Surat Pemberitahuan dan ditetapkan tanggal 28 Oktober 2019.  Surat tersebut berisi pemberitahuan yang ditujukan kepada para koordinator dan sub koordinator serta para CPNS 2018/2019.“Surat palsu beredar. Kami tidak pernah membuat surat seperti itu,” tegas Menteri Tjahjo di Jakarta, Selasa (05/11/2019). Dalam surat palsu itu, berisi tindak lanjut rapat yang dipimpin Menteri PANRB Tjahjo Kumolo pada 26-27 Oktober 2019 bertempat di Kantor Kementerian PANRB dan dihadiri pada menteri. Tertulis bahwa ada beberapa hal yang telah disepakati terkait pembagian SK.Menteri Tjahjo  meminta masyarakat untuk lebih selektif dalam menerima informasi dan melakukan konfirmasi kebenaran berita/informasi kepada Kementerian PANRB.

Beware, Circulating Fake Letters in the Name of the Minister of PANRB Regarding Acceptance of CPNS
05 Nov 2019, 15:33 by faith


Beware, Circulating Fake Letters in the Name of the Minister of PANRB Regarding Acceptance of CPNS

KBRN, Jakarta: Minister of State Apparatus Empowerment and Bureaucratic Reform (PANRB) Tjahjo Kumolo asked the public to be careful about information about the recruitment of prospective civil servants (CPNS). That was said by Tjahjo in response to a fake letter in his name which was circulating in the community. The letter is numbered B / 887 / M.SM.10 / 2019 regarding Notification Letter and was set on October 28, 2019. The letter contained a notice addressed to the coordinators and sub-coordinators as well as CPNS 2018/2019. "False letters circulating. We have never made a letter like that, "said Minister Tjahjo in Jakarta, Tuesday (11/05/2019). In the fake letter, it contained a follow-up to a meeting chaired by PANRB Minister Tjahjo Kumolo on 26-27 October 2019 at the PANRB Ministry Office and attended by the minister. It was written that there were some things that had been agreed regarding the distribution of SK. Minister Tjahjo asked the public to be more selective in receiving information and confirming the truth of the news / information to the Ministry of PANRB.
